RED - it.polimi.ingsw.model.TokenColor
 
RemoteView - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server
The remote view is an object that hide the whole connection to the server It receive and send object into the socket and notify the controller as it is a real view

Creates a Remote view with player and connection
RemoteView.MessageReceiver - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.server
This class receive the PlayerAction from the connection and send those to the controller.

run(boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.Client
A client create a Socket to communicate and one Thread that listen to the socket while the connection is active
run(int) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.server.Server
The servers starts and waits for clients to connect When a client join a server it is registered (save connection) and it's connection is started in a asynchronous thread
